teratailpy.client module

class teratailpy.client.Client(token: str)

Bases: object

get_followers(display_name: str, page: int = 1, limit: int = 20) → Optional[List[BaseUser]]

This function returns a list of BaseUser objects, which are the followers of the user with the given display_name

Parameters

  • display_name (str) – The display name of the user you want to get the followers of.

  • page (int, optional) – The page number of the results to return.

  • limit (int, optional) – The number of results to return per page.

Return type

A list of BaseUser objects.

get_followings(display_name: str, page: int = 1, limit: int = 20) → Optional[List[BaseUser]]

This function returns a list of BaseUser objects that are the followings of the user with the given display_name

Parameters

  • display_name (str) – The display name of the user you want to get the followings of.

  • page (int, optional) – The page number of the results to return.

  • limit (int, optional) – The number of users to return.

Return type

A list of BaseUser objects.

get_question(question_id: str) → Optional[Question]

This function takes in a question_id and returns a Question object

Parameters

question_id (str) – The ID of the question you want to get.

Return type

A Question object

get_questions(page: int = 1, limit: int = 20) → Optional[List[Question]]

This function returns a list of Question objects, given a page number and a limit

Parameters

  • page (int, optional) – The page number to return.

  • limit (int, optional) – The number of questions to return per page.

Return type

A list of Question objects.

get_questions_with_tag(tag_name: str, page: int = 1, limit: int = 20) → Optional[List[Question]]

It takes in a tag name, page number, and limit, and returns a list of questions with that tag

Parameters

  • tag_name (str) – The name of the tag you want to get questions for.

  • page (int, optional) – The page number of the results to return.

  • limit (int, optional) – The number of questions to return per page.

Return type

A list of Question objects.

get_tag(tag_name: str) → Optional[List[Tag]]

This function returns a list of tags that match the tag name

Parameters

tag_name (str) – The name of the tag to retrieve.

Return type

A list of Tag objects

get_tags(page: int = 1, limit: int = 20) → Optional[List[Tag]]

This function returns a list of tags from the API

Parameters

  • page (int, optional) – The page number of the results to be returned.

  • limit (int, optional) – The number of results to return per page.

Return type

A list of Tag objects.

This function takes a display name and returns a user object

Parameters

display_name (str) – The display name of the user you want to get.

get_user_clips(display_name: str, page: int = 1, limit: int = 20)

This function returns a list of clips for a given user

Parameters

  • display_name (str) – The display name of the user you want to get clips from.

  • page (int, optional) – The page number of the results you want to get.

  • limit (int, optional) – The number of clips to return.

Return type

A list of clips.

get_user_questions(display_name: str, page: int = 1, limit: int = 20) → Optional[List[Question]]

This function returns a list of Question objects for a given user

Parameters

  • display_name (str) – The display name of the user.

  • page (int, optional) – The page number of the results to fetch.

  • limit (int, optional) – The number of questions to return per page.

Return type

A list of Question objects.

get_user_replies(display_name: str, page: int = 1, limit: int = 20) → Optional[List[Reply]]

This function returns a list of Reply objects for a given user

Parameters

  • display_name (str) – The display name of the user you want to get replies from.

  • page (int, optional) – The page number of the results to return.

  • limit (int, optional) – The number of replies to return per page.

Return type

A list of Reply objects.

get_user_tags(display_name: str, page: int = 1, limit: int = 20) → Optional[List[Tag]]

This function returns a list of tags for a given user

Parameters

  • display_name (str) – The display name of the user.

  • page (int, optional) – The page number of the results to fetch.

  • limit (int, optional) – The number of tags to return per page.

Return type

A list of Tag objects.

get_users(page: int = 1, limit: int = 20) → Optional[List[BaseUser]]

This function returns a list of BaseUser objects, given a page and limit

Parameters

  • page (int, optional) – The page number to get.

  • limit (int, optional) – The number of users to return per page.

Return type

A list of BaseUser objects.

search_users(query: str, page: int = 1, limit: int = 20) → Optional[List[BaseUser]]

This function searches for users by their username, and returns a list of BaseUser objects

Parameters

  • query (str) – The query to search for.

  • page (int, optional) – The page number to return.

  • limit (int, optional) – The number of results to return per page.

Return type

A list of BaseUser objects.
